name: hook0-client

scripts.check-full: npm run --silent check && npm run --silent lint && npm run --silent test
scripts.release-major: npm run --silent check-full && npm run --silent build && npm-release major
scripts.release-minor: npm run --silent check-full && npm run --silent build && npm-release minor
scripts.release-patch: npm run --silent check-full && npm run --silent build && npm-release patch

description: TypeScript SDK for Hook0 Open-Source Webhooks as a service for SaaS
